title: Introducing Prognosis Season 4: America's Broken Health-Care Costs
itunes:title: Introducing Prognosis Season 4: America's Broken Health-Care Costs
description:
Americans are paying more and getting less for their health care than ever before. On the new season of Prognosis, reporter John Tozzi explores what went wrong. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
